# Glottography dataset derived from Steever 2019 "The Dravidian Languages"

[![CLDF validation](https://github.com/Glottography/steever2019dravidian/workflows/CLDF-validation/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Glottography/steever2019dravidian/actions?query=workflow%3ACLDF-validation)

## How to cite

If you use these data please cite
- the original source
  > Steever, S.B. 2019. The Dravidian Languages. (Routledge Language Family Series.) Taylor \& Francis.
- the derived dataset using the DOI of the [particular released version](../../releases/) you were using

## Description


This dataset provides non-overlapping, contemporary speaker areas of Dravidian languages in South Asia as depicted in map 37.1 of Steever 2019.

This dataset is licensed under a CC-BY-4.0 license

## CLDF Datasets

The following CLDF datasets are available in [cldf](cldf):

- CLDF [Generic](https://github.com/cldf/cldf/tree/master/modules/Generic) at [cldf/Generic-metadata.json](cldf/Generic-metadata.json)
